meta.title: Florent Clerc - Frontend & Fullstack Developer
meta.description: Florent Clerc, 31 yeaars old, fullstack developer, frontend developer
meta.keywords: frontend developer, fullstack developer, web developer

aboutme.title: I am Florent Clerc
aboutme.subtitle: A fullstack developer, with a special interest for frontend
aboutme.presentation: With more than 10 years of experience, both in web agencies and in startups, I had the opportunities of working in multiple activity sectors (culture, data, digital marketing, ...)
aboutme.presentation2: Curious and attentive, I'm looking above all to truly understand the product to answere very need as simply as possible.

in-tact.title: Fullstack developer
in-tact.myWork: I helped developed projects for clients in multiple sectors (real estate, data, healthcare, human resources), as a developer and as a scrum master. Internally, I also helped for project scoping, project estimation, and technical interviews.

mapado.title: Fullstack Developer
mapado.presentation: Mapado is a startup developing a ticketing solution for the cultural sector
mapado.myWork: We developed a ticketing solution from scratch. I worked on the backend and in the multiple frontends (dashboard, white-label site for ticket selling, SPA for ticket sales at the counter).

batch.title: Frontend developer
batch.presentation: Batch is a CRM for mobile applications
batch.myWork: Development of a dashboard for our customers, use to configure push notification campaigns and see statistics. I also developed the frontend for a push notification monitoring tool.

nixdo.title: Fullstack Developer
nixdo.presentation: Nixdo is a SAAS for small businesses to help them synchronize their information across multiple listings and social networks (ie. Foursquare, Yelp, Tripadvisor, Twitter, Facebook)
nixdo.myWork: Development of the marketing website, the landing pages, the customer dashboard, but also the algorithm to automatically synchronize information accross dozens of local and national websites

ice-development.title: Frontend developer
ice-development.presentation: Ice Development is a web agency
ice-development.myWork: Development of multiple projects for our customers

projects.baseline: A few projects I worked on

footer.midjourney: Favicon and illustration generated on Midjourney
